SmartCardInit

public static int SmartCardInit()
The function initialize the smart card reader

Returns:
value >= 0, success in starting the process; value < 0, error code

SmartCardTerminate

public static int SmartCardTerminate()
The function clean up the resource allocated by card reader.

Returns:
value >= 0, success in starting the process; value < 0, error code

SmartCardPollEvent

public static int SmartCardPollEvent(int nTimeout_MS,
                                     SmartCardEvent event)
Parameters:
nTimeout_MS - : time out in milliseconds. if nTimeout_MS is less then zero, the searching process is infinite.
event - : card information
Returns:
value >= 0, success in starting the process; value < 0, error code

SmartCardQueryMaxNumber

public static int SmartCardQueryMaxNumber()
The function query the max the slot in this smart card reader

Returns:
value < 0 : error code, value == 0 : not defined, value > 0 ; number of slot.

SmartCardQueryPresence

public static int SmartCardQueryPresence(int nSlotIndex)
The function query whether the smart card is not existent Attention : not every slot can support this function

Parameters:
nSlotIndex - : Slot index, from 0 to ( MAX_SUPPORT_SLOT - 1 )
Returns:
value < 0 : error code, value == 0 : not existent, value > 0 ; be existent.

SmartCardOpen

public static int SmartCardOpen(int nSlotIndex)
The function open the specified card

Parameters:
nSlotIndex: - Slot index, from 0 to (MAX_SUPPORT_SLOT - 1).
Returns:
value < 0 : error code, value >= 0: success, return value is a handle.This handle will be employed bye other API as an input parameter

SmartCardClose

public static int SmartCardClose(int handle)
The function initialize the smart card reader

Parameters:
handle: - return from method of open
Returns:
value >= 0, success in starting the process; value < 0, error code

SmartCardPowerOn

public static int SmartCardPowerOn(int Handle,
                                   byte[] byteArrayATR,
                                   SmartCardSlotInfo info)
Parameters:
IActionHandler - : return from method of open
byteArrayATR - : ATRImpl
info - : card information
Returns:
value >= 0 : ATRImpl length value < 0 : error code

                                    byte[] byteArrayAPDU,

IActionHandler - : return from method of open
byteArrayAPDU - : command of APDU
nAPDULength - : length of command of APDU
byteArrayResponse - : response of command of APDU
Returns:
value >= 0 : response data length value < 0 : error code

Verification of data

Returns:
value : < 0 : error code = 0 : failed in verifying data > 0 : success
